workshoptitle: Application Continuity made simple with Universal Connection Pool

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: Prerequisites for LiveLabs (Oracle-owned tenancies). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Setup the Environment
tutorials.description: In this Lab you will configure the network and create RAC services.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Simple Application Continuity
tutorials.description: In this lab, you will create a simple demo application with a connection pool to a RAC cluster.

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Application Continuity for Planned Maintenance
tutorials.description: This lab will show you how to use database services for planned maintenance with Application Continuity.

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
